Package Creatures

Class Creature

java.lang.Object
Creatures.Creature
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cow, Hamster, Human
public abstract class Creature extends Object
An abstract class describing a creature

  • Field Details

    • inventory

      protected Inventory inventory
      Inventory object

    • position

      protected Position position
      Creature's current position on the map

    • health

      protected int health
      Health. A non-positive number means that the creature is dead.

    • attackStrength

      protected int attackStrength
      Attack strength. Used only by Humans.

    • speed

      protected final int speed
      Movement speed

    • parentMap

      protected Map parentMap
      Map were the creature lives

    • random

      protected Random random
      Random number generator object. Used to determine movement pattern.

  • Constructor Details

    • Creature

      Creature(Map parentMap, Position position, int health, int attackStrength, int speed, int inventoryCapacity)
      Construct a new creature
      Parameters:
      parentMap - A map were the creature is located
      position - Starting position
      health - Starting health
      attackStrength - Attack strength
      speed - Speed
      inventoryCapacity - Inventory capacity

  • Method Details

    • createNew

      public static Creature createNew(Creature.CreatureType creatureType, Map parentMap)
      Create a new creature of a given type. In order to create a new Human use Human(Village, Position)
      Parameters:
      creatureType - Type of creature to be created
      parentMap - A map where the creature lives
      Returns:
      A new creature object

    • attack

      public void attack(int damage, int teamID)
      Attack the creature and kill if necessary
      Parameters:
      damage - Damage to take
      teamID - Team ID of a Human who attacked

    • getNewRandomPosition

      protected Position getNewRandomPosition()
      Generate a new random position within the creature's speed limit
      Returns:
      A new position

    • move

      public void move()
      Make a random move after making sure that the new position meets the biome limit

    • takeInventory

      public Inventory takeInventory()
      Take the creature's inventory
      Returns:
      Inventory object

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Get creature's position
      Returns:

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Check if the creature is alive
      Returns:
      Whether the creature is alive

    • resurrect

      public abstract Creature resurrect()
      Create a new creature of the same type and parent map (but possibly a different starting position)
      Returns:
      A new creature

    • getIconColor

      public abstract Color getIconColor()
      Get color of the icon representing the creature in the main window
      Returns:
      Color object

    • getTeamID

      public int getTeamID()
      Get team ID of the creature
      Returns:
      Always -1, overridden by Human class
